mapper.select: /* accountPortal.selectPortalCorpCardList 포탈 법인카드 사용내역 */ SELECT ACR.ReceiptID AS "ReceiptID" , ACR.CardNo AS "CardNo" , ACR.ItemNo AS "ItemNo" , ACR.ApproveNo AS "ApproveNo" , ACR.StoreRegNo AS "StoreRegNo" , ACR.StoreName AS "StoreName" , ACR.StoreNo AS "StoreNo" , ACR.UseDate AS "UseDate" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ACR.UseDate), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "UseDateStr" FROM act_card_receipt ACR INNER JOIN act_corp_card ACC ON ACR.CardNo = ACC.CardNo WHERE 1=1 AND ( (NVL(NULLIF(ACR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) ) ) AND NVL(NULLIF(ACR.IsPersonalUse,''),'N') = 'N' AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY ACR.UseDate DESC

/* accountPortal.selectPortalCorpCardListCnt 포탈 법인카드 사용내역 */ SELECT Count(*) FROM act_card_receipt ACR INNER JOIN act_corp_card ACC ON ACR.CardNo = ACC.CardNo WHERE 1=1 AND ( (NVL(NULLIF(ACR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND ACC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (ACC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) ) ) AND NVL(NULLIF(ACR.IsPersonalUse,''),'N') = 'N'

/* accountPortal.selectExpAppAprvList 포탈 승인신청내역 */ SELECT EA.ExpenceApplicationID AS "ExpenceApplicationID" , EA.ApplicationTitle AS "ApplicationTitle" , EA.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , EA.ApplicationType AS "ApplicationType" , EA.ApplicationDate AS "ApplicationDate" , EA.UR_Code AS "UR_Code" , EA.ApplicationDate AS "ApplicationDateStr" , EA.ProcessID AS "ProcessID" FROM act_expence_application EA WHERE 1=1 AND EA.UR_Code = #{UR_Code} AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY EA.ApplicationDate DESC
/* accountPortal.selectExpAppAprvListCnt 포탈 승인신청내역 */ SELECT Count(*) FROM act_expence_application EA WHERE 1=1 AND EA.UR_Code = #{UR_Code}

/* accountPortal.selectDeadlineInfo 마감일자 조회 */ SELECT DL.DeadlineID AS "DeadlineID", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineStartDate),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "DeadlineStartDate", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineStartDate),'MM') AS "DeadlineStartMon", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "DeadlineFinishDate", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate),'MM') AS "DeadlineFinishDateMon", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(DL.DeadlineFinishDate),'DD') AS "DeadlineFinishDateDay" FROM ACT_DEADLINE DL WHERE ROWNUM <= 1 AND DL.COMPANYCODE = #{companyCode} ORDER BY DL.DeadlineID DESC

/* accountPortal.selectCorpCardUseInfoList 포탈 카드정보 목록 */ SELECT A.CardNo AS "CardNo" , '****-****-**' || substr(A.CardNo,11,2)|| '-'|| substr(A.CardNo,13) AS "CardNoView" , A.CardCompany AS "CardCompany" , A.CardCompanyName AS "CardCompanyName" , A.OwnerUserCode AS "OwnerUserCode" , A.OwnerUser AS "OwnerUser" , A.LimitAmount AS "LimitAmount" , A.UseAmt AS "UseAmt" , (A.UseAmt/A.LimitAmount)*100 AS "UsePer" , (A.LimitAmount - A.UseAmt) AS "RemainAmt" , 100-((A.UseAmt/A.LimitAmount)*100) AS "RemainPer" FROM (
SELECT CC.CardNo , CC.CardCompany , FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('CardCompany', CC.CardCompany 'ALL') CardCompanyName , CC.OwnerUserCode , USR.DisplayName OwnerUser , CC.LimitAmount , NVL(SUM(CR.AmountWon), 0) UseAmt FROM act_corp_card CC LEFT OUTER JOIN act_card_receipt CR ON CC.CardNo = CR.CardNo AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CR.UseDate), 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR( SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMM') LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user USR ON CC.OwnerUserCode = USR.UserCode WHERE 1=1 AND ( (NVL(NULLIF(CR.TossUserCode,''),'NODATA') = 'NODATA' AND CC.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (CR.TossUserCode = #{UR_Code}) OR (CC.CorpCardID IN (SELECT ACCSU.CorpCardID FROM act_corp_card_search_user ACCSU WHERE ACCSU.OwnerUserCode = #{UR_Code}) ) ) AND CC.CardStatus = 'CSTS01' GROUP BY CC.CardNo, CC.CardCompany, CC.OwnerUserCode, USR.DisplayName, CC.LimitAmount, CR.AmountWon ) A
